pages.text: Limonite Ore,  Chalcopyrite Ore, Yomi Gold Ore, and Jadeite Ore drop multiple metal ores even when using a pickaxe without Fortune enchantment.$(br2)Limonite Ore drops not only Raw Iron, but Nether Quartz. Chalcopyrite Ore drops not only Raw Copper, but Raw Iron.$(br2)From these reasons, collecting bronze, iron and gold will be more efficient.
